quote: The Auditors fluttered anxiously. And, as always happens in their species when something goes radically wrong and needs fixing instantly, they settled down to try to work how who was to blame.
quote_letters: THE AUDITORS FLUTTERED ANXIOUSLY AND AS ALWAYS HAPPENS IN THEIR SPECIES WHEN SOMETHING GOES RADICALLY WRONG AND NEEDS FIXING INSTANTLY THEY SETTLED DOWN TO TRY TO WORK HOW WHO WAS TO BLAME
